articles.description: India vs Australia 4th Test Live Score: Nathan Lyon got the key wicket of Shubman Gill in the final session on Day 3, in Ahmedabad. Catch the LIVE updates of IND vs AUS 4th Test Match, Day 3:
articles.content:
On Day, Karthik was quoted on Indian Express, "Ravi Bhai, would you have gone with Kuldeep Yadav."
However, Shastri backed Axar's selection, although he has found it hard to get wickets in this matc… [+491 chars]

articles.title: Anil Kumble's tweet after R Ashwin breaks two of his massive records in 4th Test vs Australia stirs social media - Hindustan Times
articles.description: After Ashwin's brilliant performance on a pitch where most of the other Indian bowlers struggled and Usman Khawaja and Cameron Green struck centuries, Kumble took to social media to laud the veteran spinner. | Cricket
articles.content: There surely wasn't any doubt about Ravichandran Ashwin's class and greatness. But international cricket is unforgiving. It constantly asks questions. Requires you to evolve. Ashwin has done exactly … [+2883 chars]

articles.description: Shubman Gill scored his 2nd Test century, playing only his second match of the series against Australia.
articles.content: Shubman Gill continued his second hundred in the longest format of the game on Day 3 of the 4th Test against Australia. It was in the third Test at Indore that Gill earned the nod to open alongside R… [+1906 chars]
